clinical_study.brief_title: Investigation on Home Care Needs of ALS Patients and Their Caregivers
clinical_study.official_title: Investigation on the Knowledge Needs of ALS Patients and Their Caregivers at Home

primary_outcome.description: Scale: Self-designed questionnaire Questionnaire on the Degree of Home Nursing Knowledge Needs of ALS Patients or Their Family Members;

secondary_outcome.description: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis Function Scale (ALS FRS)

intervention.description: Questionnaires were issued and collected by 6 competent nurses with strict training, data entry by 2 researchers, statistical analysis by 1 researcher, and quality control by the other 2 researchers throughout the process.

study_pop.textblock: Six rigorously trained nurses in charge will issue and collect the questionnaire, two researchers will enter the data, one researcher will perform statistical analysis of the data, and the other two researchers will control the quality of the whole process.
